https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cyFbVSajl1NGwBJdW0xOyvh9t7G.jpg Seeking funds for her orphanage in India, Isabelle travels to New York to meet Theresa, a wealthy benefactor. An invitation to attend a wedding ignites a series of events in which the past collides with the present while mysteries unravel. After the Wedding
